radiographic_examinations.findings: Gas and stool are seen throughout the colon to the level of the sigmoid/rectum. Contrast in scattered diverticula is noted. A prominent loop of gas is seen overlying the right sacral ala. Surgical staples are seen along the left abdomen. No free air or suspicious radiopaque calculi are identified. Mild-to-moderate degenerative changes in the lumbar spine. No obvious lytic or sclerotic lesion detected. Clips noted in lower left lung base.
